channel.title: MCA Website on Learning Center - CS Pratik K Shah
channel.description: Recent content in MCA Website on Learning Center - CS Pratik K Shah

item.title: Check Annual Filing Status
item.description:
How to check annual filing status on MCA V3

  1. Go to MCA Website

  2. Go to MCA Services -> FO Services -> Check Annual Filing Status

  3. Enter Company Name / LLP Name / CIN / LLPIN in given field

  4. Enter Captcha

  5. In next screen, you will see all list of SRN and Date of annual filing forms related to the selected Company / LLP

  6. You can also get copy of MCA Acknowledgement in the same list

item.title: Register User on MCA V3 Portal
item.description:
How to create account on MCA V3 portal? Register on MCA V3 portal as Business User? MCA V3 Registration. MCA V3 Registration Process. Business User Registration MCA. How to Register on the MCA V3?

Register New Business User Account on MCA V3

  1. Click on Sign up / Sign in
  2. Click on Register Button
  3. Select Business User under User Category and Select Director/Designated Partner under User Role
  4. Fill up PAN and DIN of the Director/Designated Partner
  5. Fill up all the details required on the Next Screen.
  6. Some details will be autofilled and click on Next
  7. Select Password
  8. Fill up OTP and Submit

Please follow below steps to create new account under Business User category for Director.

item.title: View Company / LLP Master Data and Signatory Details on MCA V3
item.description:
How to check company master data from MCA V3 Website? View MCA Company Master Data V3. View MCA LLP Master Data V3. Process to check Company Master Data o MCA V3.

Overview

This facility provides basic details of Company or LLP including its registration number, registered office etc.

Company Master Data

Following are the details which will be shown in this section.

  1. CIN (Corporate Idenitification Number) this is unique registration number of every Company registered with MCA. In case of LLP, LLPIN (LLP Identification Number) will be visible as its registration number.
  2. Company Name
  3. ROC (Name and Office)
  4. RD (Name and Region)
  5. Registration Number
  6. Company Category
  7. Company SubCategory
  8. Class of Company
  9. Authorised Capital
  10. Paidup Capital
  11. Number of Members(Applicable in case of company without Share Capital)
  12. Date of Incorporation
  13. Registered Address
  14. Address other than R/o where all or any books of account and papers are maintained
  15. Email Id
  16. Listed in Stock Exchange(s) (Y/N)
  17. ACTIVE compliance
  18. Suspended at stock exchange
  19. Date of last AGM
  20. Date of Balance Sheet
  21. Company Status(for efiling)

LLP Master Data

Following are the details which will be shown in this section.
